Package objets

Class Plan

java.lang.Object
objets.Plan
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObjetScene
public class Plan extends Object implements IObjetScene
Represents a plan object in the 3D scene.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Plan(Point origine, Vector normal)
    Creates a Plan object with the specified origin point and normal vector.

  • Constructor Details

    • Plan

      public Plan(Point origine, Vector normal)
      Creates a Plan object with the specified origin point and normal vector.
      Parameters:
      origine - The origin point of the plan.
      normal - The normal vector to the plan (should be normalized).

  • Method Details

    • setOrigine

      public void setOrigine(Point origine)
      Set the origin point of the plan.
      Parameters:
      origine - The origin point to set.

    • setNormal

      public void setNormal(Vector normal)
      Set the normal vector of the plan.
      Parameters:
      normal - The normal vector to set (should be normalized).

    • getOrigine

      public Point getOrigine()
      Get the origin point of the plan.
      Specified by:
      getOrigine in interface IObjetScene
      Returns:
      The origin point of the plan.

    • getRayon

      public double getRayon()
      Get the radius of the plan. Since it's a plan, the radius is always 0.
      Returns:
      The radius of the plan (always 0).

    • intersection

      public double intersection(Point lookFrom, Vector d)
      Calculate the intersection of a ray with the plan.
      Specified by:
      intersection in interface IObjetScene
      Parameters:
      lookFrom - The starting point of the ray.
      d - The direction vector of the ray.
      Returns:
      The parameter 't' at which the ray intersects the plan, or -1 if there is no intersection.

    • getN

      public Vector getN(Point p)
      Get the normal vector to the plan at a given point.
      Specified by:
      getN in interface IObjetScene
      Parameters:
      p - The point at which to calculate the normal vector.
      Returns:
      The normal vector to the plan.
